author: makortel
body:
This PR in an attempt to clean up all the temporary 2017 workflows and eras introduced in pre12. The old "2017AllNew" workflow is made as the new "2017" workflow. It is possible that I missed something, but at least everything in this PR needs to be done.

In addition, a "2017 design" workflow is added for further detailed (tracking) studies with the new geometry (also after 810pre13).

Tested in 8_1_0_pre12 (rebased on top of ~~CMSSW_8_1_X_2016-09-28-2300~~ ~~CMSSW_8_1_X_2016-10-02-2300~~ ~~CMSSW_8_1_X_2016-10-06-1100~~ ~~CMSSW_8_1_X_2016-10-12-1100~~ CMSSW_8_1_X_2016-10-16-1100), no changes expected between IB 108XX.0, and IB+PR 100XX.0 (or phase0/phase2). Between IB 100XX.0 and IB+PR 100XX.0 changes can be expected everywhere depending on tracker or HCAL (details being a topic of the validation of pre12).

@schneiml @veszpv @kpedro88
title: Clean up temporary 2017 workflows and eras, add "2017 design" workflow
